p: Serum samples were used for HbsAg (Hepatitis B surface antigen), anti-HbsAb (Hepatitis B surface antibody), HbeAg (Hepatitis B “e” antigen), anti-Hbe (Hepatitis B e antibody), anti-HBc (Hepatitis B core antibody), anti-HCV (HCV antibody) and anti-TP (Treponema Pallidum antibody) detection by ELISA (Lizhu Co., China). Limiting antigen avidity enzyme immunoassay (LAg-avidity EIA; Jinhao Co., China) was employed to detect recent HIV infection. All ELISA was carried out according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
